afganisthanaya pashchath thushna yudha samaye di sowiyat deshaye waka්ra aaka්ramanayata goduru wiya.ehi sowiyat hithawadi rukada aanduwak pihituwanu labiya.eya dakunu aasiyaw amarikanu widesha pa්rathipaththiyata abhiyoga kirimak wiyaga thaleban sanwidhanaya ha alkhayida sanwidhana afganisthanaya thula di itu karana ladde ema amarikanu awashyathawayayi.sowiwat deshaye bidawatimen pasuwa alkhayida ha thaleban sanwidhana wetha naraka kala dasawa uda wiya.mese sowiyat hithawadi kalapiya balawatha wu indiyawa amarikanu hithawadi goliya dhanawadi kandawurata ek wimath samanga , amarikawata mema kalapaye sowiyat wirodhinge katayuthu nadaththu kirime awashyathawaya pahawa giyeya.alkayida ha thalebanwaru hudekala bawayata path wiya.in urana wu alkhayida sanwidhanaya wadath pa්rachanda tha්rasthawadi ki්rayawaliyakata mula piruweya.sapthambra 11pa්raharaya thulin amarikawe hadawathata pa්rahara ella kale owunata wadath wedanakari pa්rathika්riyawak ath widimata salaswima sandahaya.
